Question: Masterbuilt / Kamado Joe CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Masterbuilt / Kamado Joe

Product 1

- Masterbuilt AutoIgnite Series 545: Features QuickStart Auto-Ignition button and app-enabled monitoring and control. Can cook for up to five hours with a four-pound charcoal capacity. Includes a cast iron QuickSear hopper griddle plate, bottom storage, and easy cleanup system. Priced at $499.

- Masterbuilt Gravity Series XT: Largest and most advanced model with 1,260 square-inch grill and smoker. Uses Wi-Fi and digital fan control to manage the GravityFed Hopper for up to 24 hours of controlled grill time. Features advanced control panel with graphing and alerts, fiberglass mesh gasket, U-shaped manifold, and four full body stainless steel warming racks. Priced at $1,499.

- Kamado Joe Konnected Joe: Digitally connected ceramic grill with push-button charcoal ignition and digitally controlled fan system. Offers 250 square inches of grilling space and a temperature range of 200-700°F. Can be controlled via the Kamado Joe app. Priced at $1,699.
Summary_cn:
Masterbuilt / Kamado Joe

产品1

- Masterbuilt AutoIgnite系列545：具有QuickStart自动点火按钮和应用程序监控和控制功能。最多可烹饪四磅木炭的食材长达五小时。包括铸铁QuickSear烧烤炉盘，底部储物空间和易于清洁系统。售价为499美元。

- Masterbuilt Gravity Series XT：最大且最先进的型号，带有1,260平方英寸的烧烤炉和烟熏炉。使用Wi-Fi和数字风扇控制来管理GravityFed储料箱，可实现长达24小时的可控烧烤时间。配备先进的控制面板、图形和警报功能、玻璃纤维网状密封垫、U型多孔滤器和四个全身不锈钢加热架。售价为1,499美元。

- Kamado Joe Konnected Joe：数字连接的陶瓷烧烤炉，带有按钮式木炭点火器和数字控制风扇系统。提供250平方英寸的烧烤空间和200-700°F的温度范围。可通过Kamado Joe应用程序进行控制。售价为1,699美元。
